content:
Sure, here's the P.S for email 2:

P.S. Remember, small changes in daily habits can make a big difference in your weight loss journey. Keep that in mind as you begin implementing the solutions we provided in your quiz results. And speaking of daily habits, in the next email, we'll be discussing the top 3 most common and top 3 least common habits that can sabotage your weight loss journey. Don't miss out on this valuable information!

And here's a preview of email 3:

Email 3:
Subject: Don't Let These Habits Sabotage Your Weight Loss Journey

Hi [Name],

In our last email, we talked about the importance of consistency and taking action when it comes to weight loss. But sometimes, even with the best intentions, our daily habits can sabotage our weight loss journey without us even realizing it.

That's why in this email, we're going to talk about the top 3 most common and top 3 least common habits that can sabotage your weight loss journey. From not tracking food intake to constantly chasing the next diet, these habits can make it harder to lose weight and can even lead to weight gain.

We'll also provide tips on how to overcome these habits and make sustainable changes to your daily routine. So stay tuned for some valuable insights that can help you reach your weight loss goals.

As always, if you have any questions or need any support, don't hesitate to reach out. We're here to help!

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
